articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Crews search Lake Michigan after big wave knocks 2 off pier
articles.description: Authorities say crews are searching Lake Michigan for a missing teenage girl after a large wave knocked her and another person off a pier along western Michigan
articles.content:
HOLLAND, Mich. -- 
Crews searched Lake Michigan on Thursday for a missing teenage girl after a large wave knocked her and another person off a pier along western Michigan and she couldn't get out of the water, authorities said.

articles.title: A milestone for French rail strikes: 29th day of walkouts
articles.description: It's the 29th straight day of French rail strikes against government plans to reform the country's retirement system
articles.content:
PARIS -- 
With 29 straight days of walkouts, French rail strikes against government plans to reform France's retirement system marked a new milestone Thursday, surpassing even the lengths of strikes in the 1980s.

articles.title: Hong Kong legal groups condemn protester insults to judge
articles.description: Hong Kong's Law Society and Bar Association are condemning abusive graffiti sprayed by protesters on a court building that insulted a judge by name

HONG KONG --
